Package de.engehausen.treemap.swt.impl

SWT-specific implementations for some tree map UI interfaces.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
BorderRenderer<N> A rectangle renderer which only renders non-leaf rectangles.
CushionRectangleRenderer<N> Rectangle renderer that attempts to produce a "cushion effect" for the rectangles.
CushionRectangleRendererEx<N> Rectangle renderer that attempts to produce a "cushion effect" for the rectangles.
DefaultColorProvider<N> The default color provider uses a set of colors mapped to nodes by their hash code (this may appear a little random, but makes them distinguishable a bit better).
DefaultRectangleRenderer<N> The default rectangle renderer simply renders the given rectangle using the color provided by the color provider.
LabelRenderer<N> Renders labels for rectangles.
MonoColorProvider<N> Assigns all nodes the same color (light gray).
ScalingLabelRenderer<N> Renders labels for rectangles scaled to fit the rectangles, keeping proportion of the font used.
 

Package de.engehausen.treemap.swt.impl Description

SWT-specific implementations for some tree map UI interfaces.
